name: keystone-voms
body:
# Keystone VOMS authentication module

This module is intended to provide VOMS authentication to a Grizzly
OpenStack Keystone. It is designed to be integrated as an external
authentication plugin, so that Keystone will preserve its original
features and users will still be able to authenticate using any of the
Keystone native mechanisms.

## Documentation

Documentation can be read [online in readthedocs.org](https://keystone-voms.readthedocs.org/en/latest/).

## What is this?

This module is a WSGI middleware that will provide VOMS authentication into OpenStack Keystone as a external authentication plugin. With this module it is possible to:

* As a resource provider, enable users from a given VO to get access to a OpenStack installation.
* As a user, use the VOMS credentials to authenticate against a VOMS aware OpenStack cloud using the standard tools, without any modifications (using the [VOMS authentication plugin](https://github.com/IFCA/voms-auth-system-openstack)).
